verbs.description: The Trump administration [V: might] cover the cash - poor nation ’s hotel expenses , or ask Singapore to do it .

[ARG0: The Trump administration] [ARGM-MOD: might] cover the cash - poor nation ’s hotel expenses , or [V: ask] [ARG2: Singapore] [ARG1: to do it] .
The Trump administration might cover the cash - poor nation ’s hotel expenses , or ask [ARG0: Singapore] to [V: do] [ARG1: it] .
